pages.text: JEI stands for Just Enough Items, or Jyou Ereally Ineedtogetusedtousingthis. It's going to be your best friend from here on out. Calling it a crafting guide is an understatement; A crafting assistant and planner, or a lifelong partner, are two terms for it.

JEI stands for Just Enough Items, or Jyou Ereally Ineedtogetusedtousingthis. It's going to be your best friend from here on out. Use the search bar to find items, click items to see how to craft them, right click them to see what they're used in. Those are the basic uses of JEI, but it has much more in store, like moving items to the crafting grid to easily craft items, using the small + button when viewing a recipe.
